    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardGeneration

        public BoardGeneration()
        Board Generation Construction Board Generation, window size and number of Columns, Rows and elements per space are defined on construction. Generates Jframe's for Board Visualisation.

    • Method Detail

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard(int[][][] boardSpaceData)
        drawBoard() will call the MyPanel class which will paint a JPanel onto our Jframe. Draw Board is used for the beginning of the game, it does not display player positions. Xrect and Yrect determine size of a space on the board in pixels, this is determined by the size of the Jframe and the number of spaces on the board.
        Parameters:
        boardSpaceData - Board Space data is a 3 dimensional int array (int[][][]) that contains all of the space data (space num, space type and branch num).

      • redrawBoard

        public void redrawBoard(int[][][] boardSpaceData,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Player> players,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Space> spaces)
        reDrawBoard() redraws the same board as drawBoard() but it includes Players Pawns and Player Legend
        Parameters:
        boardSpaceData - Board Space data is a 3 dimensional int array (int[][][]) that contains all of the space data (space num, space type and branch num).
        players - List of Player objects, used for placing Player Pawns on the board.
        spaces - List of Space Objects.

      • boardMatrixfromcsvFile

        public int[][][] boardMatrixfromcsvFile(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                        int numRows,
                                        int numColumns,
                                        int sizeElement)
        boardMatrixfromcsvFile() reads the CSV file contained in path and parses it into an int[][][] array. Elements in the CSV file are in the form x_y_z , where x is the space number, y is the space type (int which corresponds to space type) and z is the branch value.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to Board CSV File.
        numRows - The number of Rows in the CSV file.
        numColumns - The number of Columns in the CSV file.
        sizeElement - Number of elements in each space element.
        Returns:
        Returns BoardSpaceData, a 3 dimensional int array (int[][][]) that contains all of the space data (space num, space type and branch num).
